docs.snippet: A memo to umpires essentially said that if a runner is clearly out, and would have been so regardless of the catcher’s positioning, he will now remain out....
docs.lead_paragraph: A memo to umpires essentially said that if a runner is clearly out, and would have been so regardless of the catcher’s positioning, he will now remain out.
docs.abstract: MLB urges umpires to apply common sense to new rule on home plate collisions that has confounded players and fans; calls based on strict interpretation of rule have often overturned plays in which runner would clearly have been out.

docs.snippet: The Ivy League-educated former head of New York Mets ticket sales sued the club Wednesday, saying she was fired last month after insults and humiliation were hurled at her by the club owner's son, a top team executive who she claimed was upset tha...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Ivy League-educated former head of New York Mets ticket sales sued the club Wednesday, saying she was fired last month after insults and humiliation were hurled at her by the club owner's son, a top team executive who she claimed was upset that she had a child without being married.

headline.main: Ex-Top NY Mets Female Exec Sues Team Over Firing
